remarks: The double orthocomplement of a singleton is its span.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dochocsn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochocsn.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochocsn.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochocsn.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochocsn.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
dochocsn.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochocsn.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
dochocsn $p |- ( ph -> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` { X } ) ) = ( N ` { X } ) ) $.
